General.Name: Kehua Holdings Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Kehua Holdings Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and sale of various parts and components of turbochargers in China. It offers turbocharger components, hydraulic pumps/valves, and construction machinery parts. The company also provides casting services. It also exports its products to customers in North America, South America, Europe, Japan, South Korea, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Kehua Holdings Co.,Ltd. Kehua Holdings Co.,Ltd was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Jiangsu, the People's Republic of China.

3.Name: Mr. Jinlin  Gu
3.Title: Deputy Mang. of Technology Devel. Center & Member of the Supervisory Board
